==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Yazadaha may be derived from two Sanskrit words: yasa which means "fame",<ref>Wisdom Library: [https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/yasa Yasa]</ref> and daha which means "pool".<ref>Wisdom Library: [https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/daha Daha]</ref>
